translations: 铺路用的石头（等于 pitcher）；（獾等的）洞穴

sentences.sentence: Sett aside some time each day to listen.
sentences.translation: 每天留出一点时间来听节目。 。

sentences.sentence: Sett small goals every day and work hard to achieve.
sentences.translation: 每天树立小目标然后努力实现。

sentences.sentence: Sett out your work clothes and pack your lunch at night.
sentences.translation: 在晚上准备好你的工作服装，包好你的午餐。
